languages.text: Система убеждений отслеживает ваши решения и в зависимости от них меняет нарративный и игромеханический облик Вольного Торговца. Убеждения оказывают существенное влияние на сюжет, в том числе и на финал игры, а также дают разнообразные механические {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} персонажам. Вольный Торговец получает очки убеждений, выбирая определенные варианты в диалогах, эскплорационных событиях или при развитии колоний. Когда одно из убеждений достигает ранга III поборник, оно становится основным направлением для развития персонажа. После этого оставшиеся два типа убеждений не могут подняться выше ранга II сторонник.
languages.original_text: The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end. They also offer various mechanical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to characters. Your Rogue Trader can gain conviction points by selecting certain options during dialogues, exploration events, and colony development. When one of the conviction branches reaches the Votary rank, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, other two conviction branches can't raise above the Adherent rank.

languages.text: The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end. They also offer various mechanical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to characters. traits.locale_text: The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both the narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end and also offer various mechanical bonuses to characters. Your Rogue Trader can gain conviction points by selecting certain options in dialogues, exploration events, and colony development.

The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both the narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end and also offer various mechanical bonuses to characters. Your Rogue Trader can gain conviction points by selecting certain options in dialogues, exploration events, and colony development.

The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end. They also offer various mechanical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to characters. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

languages.text: Das Überzeugungen-System verfolgt deine Entscheidungen und verändert deinen Freihändler in Bezug auf Geschichte und Gameplay. Überzeugungen haben großen Einfluss auf das Fortschreiten sowie das Ende der Spielgeschichte. Sie bieten Charakteren außerdem verschiedene technische {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}. Dein Freihändler kann Überzeugungspunkte durch die Wahl bestimmter Optionen in Dialogen, durch Erkundungsereignisse und Kolonieentwicklung erhalten. Wenn einer der Überzeugungszweige Rang III: Geweihter erreicht, wird er zum Hauptfokus des Charakters. Wenn das passiert, können die anderen beiden Überzeugungszweige nicht mehr über Rang II: Anhänger gesteigert werden.
languages.original_text: The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end. They also offer various mechanical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to characters. Your Rogue Trader can gain conviction points by selecting certain options during dialogues, exploration events, and colony development. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: Das Überzeugungssystem verfolgt deine Entscheidungen und verändert deinen Freihändler hinsichtlich Geschichte und Gameplay. Überzeugungen haben großen Einfluss auf das Fortschreiten sowie das Ende der Spielgeschichte. Sie bieten Charakteren außerdem verschiedene technische {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}. Dein Freihändler kann Überzeugungspunkte durch die Wahl bestimmter Optionen in Dialogen, durch Forschungsereignisse und Kolonieentwicklung erhalten.

languages.text: Le système de convictions suit vos décisions et modifie votre libre-marchand en termes de narration et de gameplay. Les convictions influencent considérablement le déroulement de l'histoire et sa fin. Elles offrent également différents {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} mécaniques aux personnages. Votre libre-marchand peut gagner des points de conviction en choisissant certaines options lors des dialogues, des événements d'exploration et du développement de colonies. Lorsque votre personnage atteint le rang III (Disciple) d'une branche de conviction, elle devient son intérêt principal et les deux autres branches de conviction ne peuvent plus dépasser le rang II (Partisan).
languages.original_text: The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end. They also offer various mechanical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to characters. Your Rogue Trader can gain conviction points by selecting certain options during dialogues, exploration events, and colony development. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: Le système de convictions suit vos décisions et modifie votre Libre-Marchand en termes de narration et de gameplay. Les convictions influent considérablement sur le déroulement de l'histoire et sa fin. Elles offrent également différents {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} mécaniques aux personnages. Votre Libre-Marchand peut gagner des points de conviction en choisissant certaines options lors des dialogues, des événements d'exploration et du développement des colonies.

languages.text: 信念系统会不断记录您的决定，基于您的决定改变游戏体验与游戏剧情。您选择的信念道途，会对游戏剧情与最终结局会有很大影响。不同的道途还会提供不同的机制奖励{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}。 您的行商浪人可以在对话、探索事件与殖民地发展的过程中选择特定对话，从而获得信念点数。 当角色的某项信念到达第三级：信奉者时，该信念便会成为该角色的主要信念。当人物拥有主要信念之后，其余两条信念分支最多便只能提升至第二级：拥护者，无法继续提升。
languages.original_text: The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end. They also offer various mechanical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to characters. Your Rogue Trader can gain conviction points by selecting certain options during dialogues, exploration events, and colony development. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: 信念系统会不断记录您的决定，基于您的决定改变游戏体验与游戏剧情。您选择的信念道途，会对游戏剧情与最终结局会有很大影响。不同的道途还会提供不同的机制奖励。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g} 您的行商浪人可以在对话、探索事件与殖民地发展的过程中选择特定对话，从而获得信念点数。

languages.text: El sistema de convicción monitoriza tus decisiones y modifica a tu Comerciante Independiente en lo que respecta a narrativa y jugabilidad. Las convicciones influyen sobremanera en el desarrollo de la historia del juego y su desenlace. También ofrecen distintas {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} mecánicas a los personajes. Tu Comerciante Independiente puede ganar puntos de convicción al seleccionar ciertas opciones en diálogos, eventos de exploración y desarrollo de colonias. Cuando una de las convicciones alcanza el rango III: Devoto, se convierte en el enfoque central del personaje. Cuando sucede, las otras dos convicciones no podrán subir del rango II: Partidario.
languages.original_text: The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end. They also offer various mechanical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to characters. Your Rogue Trader can gain conviction points by selecting certain options during dialogues, exploration events, and colony development. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: El sistema de convicción monitoriza tus decisiones y modifica a tu Comerciante Independiente en lo que respecta a narrativa y jugabilidad. Las convicciones influyen sobremanera en el desarrollo de la historia del juego y su desenlace. También ofrecen distintas {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} mecánicas a los personajes. Tu Comerciante Independiente puede ganar puntos de convicción al seleccionar ciertas opciones en diálogos, eventos de exploración y desarrollo de colonias.

languages.original_text: The belief system tracks the player's decisions and, depending on them, changes the narrative and game mechanics of the player. Beliefs have a significant impact on the story, including the final ending, and also provide various mechanical bonuses to the protagonist. The player gains belief points by choosing certain options in dialogue, escapist events, or when developing his colonies.

languages.text: 信念システムはあなたの決断を記録して、ストーリーとゲームプレイの両面でローグトレーダーを変化させる。信念はゲームのストーリー展開やエンディングに大きな影響を持ち、キャラクターへ自動的に様々な{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。 会話や探索イベント、コロニー開発中にローグトレーダーが特定のオプションを選択することで、信念ポイントを獲得可能。 分岐信念のひとつがランク3の信奉者になると、その信念がキャラクターの主軸となる。そうなった場合、他のふたつの分岐信念はランク2の門下生より上になることはない。
languages.original_text: The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end. They also offer various mechanical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to characters. Your Rogue Trader can gain conviction points by selecting certain options during dialogues, exploration events, and colony development. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.

traits.locale_text: 信念システムはプレイヤーの決断を追跡し、それに応じてローグトレーダーの物語やゲームプレイが変化する。信念はゲームのストーリーの展開やエンディングに大きな影響を持つ。また、キャラクターに様々なメカニカル{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が付与される。 ローグトレーダーは会話中の選択肢やまた探索イベントやコロニーの発展により信念ポイントを獲得することができる。

languages.text: Kanaat sistemi aldığın kararları izler ve Hür Tacir'ini hem senaryo hem de oynanış bakımından değiştirir. Kanaatlerin oyunun hikâyesinin nasıl gelişeceği ve sona ereceği üzerinde büyük etkileri bulunur. Ayrıca karakterlere oyun mekaniği anlamında {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} da sunarlar. Hür Tacir; diyaloglar, keşif olayları ve koloni gelişimi esnasında belirli seçenekleri seçerek kanaat puanı kazanabilir. Kanaat dallarından bir tanesi III. kademe olan Ateşli'ye ulaştığında o kanaat, karakterinin ana odağı hâline gelir. Bu olduğunda diğer iki kanaat dalı, II. kademe olan Taraftar'ın üstüne çıkamaz.
languages.original_text: The convictions system tracks your decisions and alters your Rogue Trader in terms of both narrative and gameplay. Convictions have a large impact on how the game's story unfolds and how it will end. They also offer various mechanical {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to characters. Your Rogue Trader can gain conviction points by selecting certain options during dialogues, exploration events, and colony development. When one of the conviction branches reaches rank III: Votary, it becomes the character's main focus. When that happens, the other two conviction branches cannot be raised above rank II: Adherent.
